scan_table_check.description: Writing automated tests is a good habit. And its never too late to get started. Each application should at least have an ATF test suite (named after the application itself) so that there is a place to group all tests that are related to the application.
scan_table_check.name: CodeSanity - Application ATF test suite
scan_table_check.resolution_details: Add an ATF test suite in the scope of the application. Name the suite exctly like the application.
scan_table_check.short_description: An application should have an ATF test suite named after the application
